derivation: from the prefix k and H1931 (הוּא);
outline:
1. thus, here, in this manner
    1. thus, so
    2. here, here and there
    3. until now, until now...until then, meanwhile
kjv_def: also, here, + hitherto, like, on the other side, so (and much), such, on that manner, (on) this (manner, side, way, way and that way), + mean while, yonder.
strongs_def: properly, like this, i.e. by implication, (of manner) thus (or so); also (of place) here (or hither); or (of time) now
